snippet: Top-ranked Jason Day shot a two-under-par 69 on Friday in the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C., for a share of the second-round lead with Kevin Chappell and Charley Hoffman.
abstract: Jason Day takes share of second-round lead at RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, SC; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Jason Day shot a two-under-par 69 on Friday in the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C., for a share of the second-round lead with Kevin Chappell and Charley Hoffman.
